page.title: 13HOUSING IN GROOMSPORT
page.content: As Groomsport was a fishing village most of the old houses are close to the sea.This was handy for the fishermen. The new houses are built on a hilly area to give the residents a good view of the harbour and Belfast Lough. There are very few hotels in the area.Groomsport House is probably the largest.However there are two caravan parks on the East or Donaghadee side of the village. The most recent houses built are in the grounds of Groomsport House.These were completed in January 1985.
